thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com | 4 of 130
thread.title: Reviewer
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Reviewer

author: Reviewer
title: Reviewer
text: I was so excited to find an online retailer for some mat boards for a project I was working on. It was great to get to customize each one at a price I can be happy about. The order came within days and I cannot wait to get the frames, mats and photos up on my wall. Will definitely be recommending and reordering when necessary.
